column4: I am having a problem configuring network interfaces inside VM on 12.04. I have two interfaces eth0 and eth1. eth0 configured as "Bridge" between host and guest. and eth1 configured as "Internal" adapter. eth1 is static. when I run #ifup eth1 I get error RTNETLINK answers: File exists
can someone read my above query
I read it, but I am not familiar enough with vms to of any help
